name: Prism Global Marketing Solutions
description:
Prism Global Marketing Solutions is an inbound marketing and sales agency and HubSpot Platinum Partner providing strategic online and inbound consulting and support to organizations around the globe. Prism Global Marketing Solutions understands the constraints of marketing time and budgets. We focus on finding the most unique and effective solutions for our clients to achieve the greatest return on investment from their marketing strategy.
 
Services include:
Inbound Marketing
Digital Marketing
HubSpot Services
Strategy Development
Integrated Marketing Campaign Development
Lead Generation
Marketing Automation
Sales Alignment
Social Media Marketing
Marketing Operations
 
Prism Global Marketing Solutions has won several awards including:
2019 HubSpot Impact Award for Marketing Enablement
2018 Inbound Marketing Agency of the Year (TMT Magazine in the UK)
2017 Strategic Marketing Agency of the Year (ACQ Magazine in the UK)
2017 Game Changer of the Year (ACQ Magazine in the UK)
2017 Marketing Consultant of the Year (Corporate Vision Magazine in the UK)
2017 Grand Prize Winner: HubSpot Impact Award
HubSpot Impact Award: Integrations Innovation Q1 2017
HubSpot Impact Award: Integrations Innovation Q4 2016
HubSpot Impact Award: Integrations Innovation Q1 2016
4 Under 40: American Marketing Association Emerging Leaders Award
HubSpot Impact Award: Services Innovation of the Year
HubSpot Impact Award: Best Client Onboarding (3rd Place)
